items.title: Personalized vaccine offers hope for patients with late-stage kidney cancer, clinical trial shows
items.description: Researchers, in a sense, manipulated each patient’s cancer in an attempt to prevent it from coming back.

items.title: I’m a refugee-turned-entrepreneur and Oxford professor. Here’s what we can all learn from the immigrant entrepreneurs who make America great
items.description: Certain principles commonly applied by immigrant entrepreneurs help explain their success—and can be borrowed.
